name: Quizapp
tagline: My port of a Quiz App in Meteor.js
body:
### Welcome to QuizApp on Meteor.
This is where I intend to capture all my learning while writing a Quiz Application. The technology stack is, well, Meteor. But I intend to do it on a Windows machine to add a little headache to the whole process. The Windows constraint is forced due to my work situation.



### Authors and Contributors
@anuragphadke19
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
